titles.title: How Vast Immense And Measureless (easy familia

properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6 v7 v8 v9 v10

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}How vast immense and measureless The love of Christ to me How else could such a wretch as I Be blessed so wondrously Be blessed so wondrously{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}To bring me back unto Himself My Lord His all did spend So I would gladly bear the cross And follow to the end And follow to the end{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}My all I have forsaken now This blessed Christ to gain Now life or death is no concern What else can me restrain What else can me restrain{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}My dear ones wealth ambition fame What can they offer me My gracious Lord for me was poor For Him I poor would be For Him I poor would be{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}My precious Savior now I love His smile I would obtain For Him let gain be turned to loss And comfort turned to pain And comfort turned to pain{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Thou art my comfort gracious Lord I've none in heav'n but Thee And who but Thee is there on earth With whom I love to be With whom I love to be{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Though loneliness and hardships come My soul can rise above This only would I ask Thee Lord Enfold me in Thy love Enfold me in Thy love{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v8
verse.lines: {lang-eng}O gracious Lord I now beseech Guide me through every stage Stand by and strengthen me to go Through this dark evil age Through this dark evil age{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v9
verse.lines: {lang-eng}The world the flesh and Satan too Do tempt my soul apace Without Thy love and Strength'ning power I may Thy name disgrace I may Thy name disgrace 10. The time dear Lord is short indeed From earth my soul set free When Thou dost come I'll sing with joy Hallelujah Lord to Thee Hallelujah Lord to Thee{/lang-eng}
